UniprotID	Q16270-2
Accession	Q16270;B4E1N2;B7Z9W7;Q07822;Q53YE6;Q9UCA8
EntryName	IBP7_HUMAN
ProteinName	Insulin-like growth factor-binding protein 7 (IBP-7) (IGF-binding protein 7) (IGFBP-7) (IGFBP-rP1) (MAC25 protein) (PGI2-stimulating factor) (Prostacyclin-stimulating factor) (Tumor-derived adhesion factor) (TAF)
GeneName	IGFBP7 MAC25 PSF
Length	279
Function	Binds IGF1 and IGF2 with a relatively low affinity. Stimulates prostacyclin (PGI2) production. Stimulates cell adhesion. Acts as a ligand for CD93 to play a role in angiogenesis (PubMed:38218180).
Subcellular Location	Secreted
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility
